## IntegerDirectAnswer interface

A direct answer for an integer field.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IntegerDirectAnswer extends BaseFieldValueDirectAnswer<number> 
```
**Extends:** [BaseFieldValueDirectAnswer](./anguyen-search-core-testtt.basefieldvaluedirectanswer.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt;

## Remarks

`IntegerDirectAnswer`<!-- -->s are only used for built in number fields. Custom number fields use [DecimalDirectAnswer](./anguyen-search-core-testtt.decimaldirectanswer.md) instead.
